statements: UPDATE threats SET severity = 5, description = 'Updated Description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE threats SET name = 'New Threat Name', severity = 3 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE threats SET severity = 5, name = 'SQL Injection' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE threats SET description = 'Denial of Service attack' WHERE name = 'Cross-Site Scripting';
UPDATE ThreatIntelligenceData SET risk_level = 'High' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ThreatAnalysis SET status = 'Resolved', analyst_assigned = 'Jane Doe' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE ThreatIntelligenceData SET confidence_rating = 'High', detection_method = 'Network Monitoring' WHERE threat_type = 'Malware' AND severity = 'High';
UPDATE ThreatAnalysis SET analyst_comments = 'No indications of compromise found.', analysis_timestamp = NOW(), result = 'Safe' WHERE threat_level = 'Low' AND priority = 'Low';
UPDATE ThreatIndicators SET indicator_value = 'malware' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE IncidentReports SET description = 'Unauthorized access detected' WHERE incident_name = 'Data Breach';
UPDATE ThreatIndicators SET indicator_value = 'malicious', indicator_type = 'IP' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE IncidentReports SET description = 'Data breach incident involving customer information' WHERE incident_date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE threat_intelligence SET threat_description = 'New description' WHERE threat_id = 1;
UPDATE intel_sources SET source_type = 'New type', source_url = 'http://newurl.com' WHERE source_id = 2;
UPDATE threat_intelligence SET threat_description = 'New description for Threat 1', threat_level = 2 WHERE threat_id = 1;
UPDATE intel_sources SET source_type = 'Threat Feed', source_url = 'http://newthreatfeed.com' WHERE source_id = 3;
UPDATE ThreatActors SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Incidents SET status = 'Closed', severity = 'Low' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE ThreatActors SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Incidents SET severity = 'High', status = 'Closed' WHERE id = 3;
